Key:
(It seems like everyone has finished cooking. A
variety of dishes have been laid out across the
table.)
I don't know if I can eat them all.

Well, can't help it. There's seven people's worth
of food here.

Well, among them are some questionable dishes that
I'm not sure I can eat.
Hey, who made such a thing?!

Tohka, I'm sorry but you're the main offender! I
mean, only the outside is cooked... The inside
is pretty much raw.
Hmm... But I cooked it on the barbecue...

It was way bigger than the barbecue... Well, I
guess I can eat the outside part that's cooked.

Honestly, it's not something you can eat. Tohka
Yatogami's dish has been disqualified on the
grounds of unsafe consumption.

Wh-What are you talking about?! How about you,
Origami Tobiichi?!

Uh, Origami... Is it this black, tar-looking
thing?
They're stewed vegetables. Black sesame sauce.
So this is black sesame sauce, huh...

The dish has been adjusted perfectly for caloric
content. This should make you feel energetic.

I'm going to ask just in case... but did you put
in too many things you shouldn't have, and
then tried to cover it up by making it black?
Open sesame.

Not now! I can also smell the sweet chemical smell
of an energy drink! It's clearly dangerous!
Don't worry. It'll give you sexual power.

Listen to me... A meal refers to something like
stewed meat and potatoes. And this...

I-It... was me... S-Sorry... I burnt
it a little...
This is totally fine.
Yoshino made it with love. You'd better enjoy it,\nShido-kun!
Yeah, I sure will.

My, my... My cooking is totally standing out. It
wasn't much of a battle, so I feel surprised.

So this pot-au-feu is your dish, Kurumi? You're
right, it looks delicious. And this smell... did
you use wine as an ingredient?

Wow, you noticed. Amazing, Shido-san. You're so
clever, I can feel myself falling for you.
O-Okay...

But unfortunately, that doesn't mean that he'll
like it. I know Shido's preferences better than
anyone.

You sure seem confident, Flame Spirit-san. So what
did you make?
Hehe... This!

Toast, eggs sunny-side up, salad...
Uh, this is breakfast.
Wh-What...? You always eat it.

Y-Yeah... I mean in the morning, it's easy to make
when I don't have much time. So we do eat it
a lot.

Bwahaha. You guys are nothing! Yuzuru and I put
our souls into our dish. This Master Plan
is second to none.

Confidence. When Kaguya and Yuzuru cooperate,
there is nothing to be afraid of.

The Yamais made omelettes, just as they said they
would.

Side dish. We also made consommé and burdock root
salad.

Wait, Yuzuru! I thought the battle was based off
of one dish!

Objection. Although the battle may be one dish,
there were no rules about providing side dishes.
Wh-What?!

Yuzuru is right. We never set any rules against
making sides. However, it's not counted in
the judgement.

Hehe... That's fine. This is just the result of
our thinking about our servant... It's no
big deal.

Rather, I feel like I made something dangerous.
The cooking goddess smiled upon us. This amazing
dish will be talked about for thousands of years.

Kaguya, you're always exaggerating... But it does
look really delicious. Aside from the main dish,
you also put together some sides, so it seems great.

Confession. The key ingredient of this dish's
overall taste is the onion that Kaguya cut as
she cried.

Y-You don't have to tell him about the
crying part!

Hahaha, I look forward to it. And compared to
that, this final dish... I wish I never saw it.

What are you talking about, darling? This is curry
made with lots of love.

Curry... It did smell similar, but I refuse to
call this curry...
Doesn't it smell delicious?
The smell, yeah... but the color. What is it?

I asked for everyone's opinions over the phone and
put them all in.

Although it does smell like curry, I just can't
take it...

It'll be fine～ I'll feed you, so just open your
mouth, darling.
Shido. Then, I too will feed you. Eat mine first.
Whoa... Hold on, you guys.

Hehe, be happy, Shido...! I will personally offer
you this honorable meal.
Open mouth. Please eat Yuzuru's as well.

Oh, Shido-san? Of course you're going to eat mine
as well, aren't you?
Shido! Mine too! Meat, eat the meat!

I can't eat them all at once! Tohka, I can only
eat the outside of yours. Stop it, you guys!
Order! I'll eat them in order!
Hey, don't forget mine. I did make it, you know.
Au... um...
Yoshino, now's your chance. You can feed\nShido-kun with your mouth.

You guys... Hng... You guys can... Ngh...
Calm down... Gah... and let me eat... Bahh...!
Yeah, I knew this would happen.
